options: ["He gets up at 8 o'clock.", "He gets up at 9 o'clock.", "He gets up at 7 o'clock.", "He gets up at 10 o'clock."]
questions: What time does Mr. Smith get up the next morning?
article:
Mr. Smith likes playing cards at night and goes to bed very late. He often oversleeps . Mrs. Smith has to wake him up ,so he won't be late for work.
One day,they have a big fight . They do not speak to each other. In the evening,Mr. Smith gives his wife a piece of paper. The paper says "Call me at seven o'clock in the morning". Then he goes to bed.
The next morning,when Mr. Smith wakes up,it's already 9:00. He is very angry. He gets up and puts on his clothes. He finds another piece of paper on the table. "It's seven o'clock. Get up!"
